      • getRegistrationOrderComparator

        public abstract java.util.Comparator<java.lang.String> getRegistrationOrderComparator()
        Comparator compares action ids (String) on order of action registration.
        Returns:
        a negative integer if action that corresponds to the first id was registered earlier than the action that corresponds to the second id; zero if both ids are equal; a positive number otherwise.

      • getKeyStroke

        public static javax.swing.KeyStroke getKeyStroke(java.lang.String s)
        Similar to KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(String) but allows keys in lower case.

        I.e. "control x" is accepted and interpreted as "control X".

        Returns:
        null if string cannot be parsed.

      • getPluginActions

        public abstract java.lang.String [] getPluginActions(PluginId pluginId)
